content.title: Dr. Marlow Wessex
content.body:
Dr. Wessex helped pioneer the invention of cybernetics, and was a key proponent of the Cyborg Rights Movement.
He's been awarded multiple prizes, chief of which was a Nobel Peace Prize - the last person to receive one of those before its rebranding.
He's the one who helped me when I first came to him, practically begging for cybernetics to replace my near-destroyed limbs and organs.
